JogAmp BOF Siggraph 2013

The JogAmp</a> project had a BOF session at this years Siggraph convention. They presented a lot of amazing projects that use JogAmp. You can find the original session video at youtube</a>.

As a part of their presentation they showcased Nifty (look for it at 0:20:54</a> but make sure you watch the whole video too!) with some slides, a demo and a showcase video that we've prepared for them. The original video was cut a bit because of the time limitations of their presentation.

However the original full-length video is far too awesome so we'd like to show it to you right here :)

Featuring (in the order of appearance):

  • Pirate Hell by Ceyphren</a></li>
  • HeroDex by Zero Separation</a></li>
  • Attack of the Gelatinous Blob by Brent Owens</a></li>
  • CHAOS by 4Realms</a></li>
  • Illarion by Illarion</a></li>
    </ul>

    Thanks for providing footage and/or demo versions people! :)

JogAmp BOF Siggraph 2013 was published on August 01, 2013.
